properties.entry: SELECT S.S_NO , S_NAME , S_TO , S_DAY , S_STARTPERIOD , S_ENDPERIOD , S_STARTTIME , S_ENDTIME , S_EXPLAIN , S_NOTICE , CNAME , NICKNAME , FILE_PATH , CHANGE_NAME , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOINSTUDY M WHERE M.S_NO = S.S_NO) AS "studyMemberNum" FROM STUDY S JOIN CATEGORY USING(CID) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON A.S_NO = S.S_NO JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE S_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY S_NO DESC
SELECT S_NO, COUNT(*) "s_memberCount" FROM STUDY JOIN JOINSTUDY USING (S_NO) WHERE S_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY S_NO ORDER BY S_NO DESC

INSERT INTO STUDY ( S_NO , S_NAME , S_TO , S_DAY , S_STARTPERIOD , S_ENDPERIOD , S_STARTTIME , S_ENDTIME , S_EXPLAIN , S_NOTICE , S_STATUS , USER_NO , CID ) VALUES ( SEQ_SNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , UPLOAD_DATE , STATUS , S_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , SEQ_SNO.CURRVAL )

SELECT S_NO , S_NAME , S_TO , S_DAY , S_STARTPERIOD , S_ENDPERIOD , S_STARTTIME , S_ENDTIME , S_EXPLAIN , S_NOTICE , USER_NO , CNAME , NICKNAME FROM STUDY JOIN CATEGORY USING(CID) JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT USING(S_NO) WHERE S_STATUS = 'Y' AND S_NO = ?
UPDATE STUDY SET S_STATUS = 'N' WHERE S_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUDY WHERE S_STATUS ='Y'
INSERT INTO JOINSTUDY ( USER_NO , S_NO ) VALUES ( ? , ? )
SELECT USER_NO , S_NO FROM JOINSTUDY WHERE USER_NO=? AND S_NO=?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOINSTUDY WHERE USER_NO=?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOINSTUDY WHERE S_NO=?

SELECT S.S_NO , S_NAME , S_TO , CNAME , FILE_PATH , CHANGE_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOINSTUDY M WHERE M.S_NO = S.S_NO) AS "studyMemberNum" , S_DAY FROM STUDY S JOIN JOINSTUDY M ON(S.S_NO = M.S_NO) JOIN CATEGORY USING(CID) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(S.S_NO = A.S_NO) WHERE S_STATUS = 'Y' AND M.USER_NO = ?
SELECT S_NO FROM STUDY WHERE USER_NO=? AND S_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY S_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "userJoinStudyNum" FROM JOINSTUDY WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, SLIST.* FROM(SELECT S.S_NO , S_NAME , S_TO , S_DAY , S_STARTPERIOD , S_ENDPERIOD , S_STARTTIME , S_ENDTIME , S_EXPLAIN , S_NOTICE , CNAME , NICKNAME , FILE_PATH , CHANGE_NAME , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOINSTUDY M WHERE M.S_NO = S.S_NO) AS "studyMemberNum" FROM STUDY S JOIN CATEGORY USING(CID) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON A.S_NO = S.S_NO JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE S_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY S_NO DESC) SLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUDY WHERE S_NAME = ?

SELECT MAX(PR.S_LIMIT) , MAX(PR.S_TO_LIMIT) , MAX(PR.TODO_LIMIT) , MAX(PR.S_LIMIT_DATE) FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PURCHASE PR ON(P.PRODUCT_NO = PR.PRODUCT_NO) WHERE PR.USER_NO =? AND TO_CHAR(PR.EXPIRATION_DATE, 'yyyymmdd') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyymmdd')
INSERT INTO TIMER ( S_DAY, USER_NO, S_NO, S_TIME ) VALUES ( SYSDATE, ?, ?, ? )
DELETE FROM JOINSTUDY WHERE S_NO = ? AND USER_NO = ?
